H0.text: Nigel Farage is the leader of which political party. Conservative Party

H1.text: Nigel Farage is the leader of which political party. Brexit Party

H2.text: Nigel Farage is the leader of which political party. Liberal Democrats

H3.text: Nigel Farage is the leader of which political party. Ukip

A4.text: Farage was the leader of the Brexit Party (renamed Reform UK in 2021) from 2019 to 2021.

A5.text: Farage was the leader of the UK Independence Party (UKIP) from 2006 to 2009 and 2010 to 2016.

A6.text: The Brexit Party was renamed Reform UK in 2021.
